doCommand

private int doCommand(java.util.List<java.lang.String> command)
               throws java.io.IOException
Executes command line commands. Parses and returns ping time.

Parameters:
command - The list of commands to send the operating system.
Returns:
The parsed time of a ping.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Throws exception if no access to command line.

getPingFromToken

int getPingFromToken(java.lang.String answer)
Parses the command line output, looks for ping time and returns it. This method decides between operating systems and calls the correct sub-function.

Parameters:
answer - The string that was returned from the command line.
Returns:
The parsed ping time from command line output.

WINDOWS_getPingFromToken

int WINDOWS_getPingFromToken(java.lang.String answer)
Parses the command line output from a windows machine (tested on windows 7)

Parameters:
answer - The command line output from windows.
Returns:
The parsed ping time

LINUX_getPingFromToken

int LINUX_getPingFromToken(java.lang.String answer)
Parses the command line output from a linux machine (tested on CentOS)

Parameters:
answer - The command line output from windows.
Returns:
The parsed ping time
